<a id="TubeTrailMesh"></a>

# TubeTrailMesh

**Inherits:** [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) **\<** [Mesh](Mesh.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a straight tube-shaped [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) with variable width.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**TubeTrailMesh** represents a straight tube-shaped mesh with variable width. The tube is composed of a number of cylindrical sections, each with the same [section_length](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_section_length) and number of [section_rings](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_section_rings). A [curve](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_curve) is sampled along the total length of the tube, meaning that the curve determines the radius of the tube along its length.

This primitive mesh is usually used for particle trails.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [3D Particle trails](../tutorials/3d/particles/trails.md)

- [Particle systems (3D)](../tutorials/3d/particles/index.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_cap_bottom"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **cap_bottom** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_cap_bottom)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cap_bottom**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_cap_bottom**\ (\ )

If ``true``, generates a cap at the bottom of the tube. This can be set to ``false`` to speed up generation and rendering when the cap is never seen by the camera.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_cap_top"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **cap_top** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_cap_top)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cap_top**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_cap_top**\ (\ )

If ``true``, generates a cap at the top of the tube. This can be set to ``false`` to speed up generation and rendering when the cap is never seen by the camera.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **curve** [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_curve)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_curve**\ (\ value\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ )
- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_curve**\ (\ )

Determines the radius of the tube along its length. The radius of a particular section ring is obtained by multiplying the baseline [radius](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_radius) by the value of this curve at the given distance. For values smaller than ``0``, the faces will be inverted. Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_radial_steps"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **radial_steps** = `8` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_radial_steps)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radial_steps**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_radial_steps**\ (\ )

The number of sides on the tube. For example, a value of ``5`` means the tube will be pentagonal. Higher values result in a more detailed tube at the cost of performance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_radius"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **radius** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_radius)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radius**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_radius**\ (\ )

The baseline radius of the tube. The radius of a particular section ring is obtained by multiplying this radius by the value of the [curve](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_curve) at the given distance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_section_length"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **section_length** = `0.2` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_section_length)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_section_length**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_section_length**\ (\ )

The length of a section of the tube.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_section_rings"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **section_rings** = `3` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_section_rings)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_section_rings**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_section_rings**\ (\ )

The number of rings in a section. The [curve](TubeTrailMesh.md#TubeTrailMesh_property_curve) is sampled on each ring to determine its radius. Higher values result in a more detailed tube at the cost of performance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TubeTrailMesh_property_sections"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **sections** = `5` [ðŸ”—](#TubeTrailMesh_property_sections)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_sections**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_sections**\ (\ )

The total number of sections on the tube.
